file_content.text: The Empire's busy fighting off the Sand People. You've got my thanks.
The Sand People are pushing those blasted Imperials back. You really stirred 'em up good!
Bet the Imps are furious after what you pulled!
Always glad to dig a thorn deeper into the Empire's side.
Happy to harm them.
They'll be nursing that wound for a long time. I'm sure of it.
I was magnificent, wasn't I?
You're something, all right. I'd wish ya luck out there, but you probably don't need it.
So long.
Better get back to business myself. Thanks again--I won't forget what you've done here.
Sand People won't last long with that water poisoned.
Good to see so many enemies of the Empire in one place.
Never seen a Jedi up close before. Bet you could take down a whole army of Imps if you wanted.
Bet you've blasted your share of Imperial scum, soldier. I could use your trigger finger.
Bet an offworlder like you's tussled with plenty of Imperial scum. Got here just in time.
Just the sort I wanted to see. Bad as my sight is, I can spot an enemy of the Empire a mile away.
I'm Commander Trudo. Some out here insist the Imperials don't plan to stay. I say once their excavations are complete, they'll conquer Anchorhead!
But you... you could help hold them off, make sure they're too busy with the Sand People to notice us.
What do the Sand People have to do with this?
The Sand People are involved?
Not just any Sand People--this is the most vicious tribe on Tatooine.
You have something specific in mind?
How would I do that?
Course I do. Involves nothing less than Tatooine's most vicious tribe of Sand People.
Cut to the chase.
Right, well there's these Sand People--the cruelest, most vicious tribe on Tatooine.
Those crazies are the only thing between us and the Imps. Sadly, they won't be around much longer.
The Empire's poisoning their water, thinning them out as we speak. Pains me to say it, but we've got to help them....
The Sand People won't trust you. They'll never take your aid.
They won't accept your help.
I know. We'll have to force it on them.
Sand People aren't easily manipulated. You must be careful.
Easier said than done.
It's risky, but we don't have another choice.
Pitting your enemies against each other? Smart strategy.
Makes good tactical sense.
Nothing like an enemy shield to soak up the Empire's wrath.
Sounds like a good plan.
Right, but we've got to help them or they won't be around long.
Don't like the sound of this.
Please believe me. It's the only solution.
Sounds like you've been out in the sun too long.
You're the crazy one.
Helping those bloodthirsty mongrels turns my stomach, but it's our only option!
I've got some water cleanser here, should be enough to clean their tainted wells. Of course, they'll try to kill you while you do it.
Still, if that tribe of Sand People fall, a lot of innocent people are next.
That's one tribe of Sand People that won't fall to the Empire. I'll make sure of it.
I'll do it.
If I have to, fine.
Thank you! You've made the right decision.
Use this cleanser to cure their water. Funny to be saving Sand People but the enemy of my enemy....
Not happening. [Refuse quest]
Go on, then. Don't blame me when the Empire's taken over the entire planet.
The Empire won't ignore us forever.
